sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Compute the phase angle in radians of a complex matrix. The general syntax for its use is p = angle(c) where c is an n-dimensional array of numerical type.

sect1.title: Internals
sect1.para: For a complex number x, its polar representation is given by \[ x = |x| e^{j\theta} \] and we can compute \[ \theta = \mathrm{atan2}(\Im x, \Re x) \]
